definitions: in a way that shows anxiety or discomfort

examples.text: I shifted uneasily in my seat
the men glanced uneasily at each other

shortDefinitions: with feeling of anxiety or discomfort

definitions: in a way that is awkward or incongruous

examples.text: his personality sits uneasily with his origins
quite luxurious enclaves coexist uneasily with slums and ghettos

shortDefinitions: in way that is awkward or incongruous
